name: Revenant
description: The Revenant is a powerful undead creature driven by vengeance, with an imposing physical presence and glowing eyes.
memorable: It can resurrect itself by inhabiting a dead humanoid corpse and is relentless in pursuing its target.
goals: Its primary goal is to exact revenge on those who wronged it in life.
relations: It may serve or be related to other vengeful undead or spirits seeking retribution.
environment: Revenants can be found in places tied to their previous life, often haunting locations of their demise.
strengths: High strength and charisma, immunity to common conditions, and great resilience to magical effects.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage and has low intelligence, limiting its problem-solving capabilities.
attacks: It performs Strangle attacks that can grapple and incapacitate targets, in addition to using psychic powers to instill fear.
most_powerful_ability: Fearsome Pursuit allows it to track a specific target relentlessly, ignoring difficult terrain.
senses: The Revenant possesses darkvision up to 60 feet.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and effects.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on spell saving throws.
Rapid Recovery allows it to regain hit points if undamaged for one minute.
Relentless ability allows resurrection in a nearby humanoid corpse.
Can instill fear and paralysis with Burning Hatred ability.
test_queries: undead with psychic and bludgeoning attacks
revenant that tracks its targets tirelessly
